err.msg: Usage: avtdeltoken toolname servername hostname hostid hosttoken pid\n
err.doc: When using the AVT license server (avtld), avtdeltoken allows to delete a token. Be careful, deleting a token under use will crash the corresponding process.

err.msg: Character out of [0-9A-Za-z] range in avertecbanner\n
err.doc: An illegal value has been used within an internal function. Please, report internal errors to Avertec Support.

err.msg: Resulting size bigger than %d columns not allowed in avertecbanner\n
err.doc: The formatting size of an object or a text does not fit the avertec banner dimensions. Please, report internal errors to Avertec Support.
Invalid variable in avttools.conf file. Check variable name or suppress wrong variable definition.
File avttools.conf cannot be printed. Correct synthax error (see documentation)

err.msg: '%s = %s' with no effect. Value '%s' already set with '%s'\n
err.doc: A variable has been set twice within avttools.conf, suppress one if possible.
A variable has been set several times. Conflicts may occur. Check the declarations of the variable within avttools.conf file and keep only one.
The string provided to the license server is too long. Use avtinfo to ensure valid value or license file are provided.
The line or message provided to the license server is too long.
The token cannot be deleted. Check token name and user rights.

err.msg: Usage: avtgenkey toolname vendor server hostid date license type\n
err.doc: The license server avt (avtld) failed to handle the license key of avtlicense file.
avtinfo displays information for the avt license server (avt). Ensure a valid tool_name is used.
The date in the license file is not valid. The license file may be invalid. Check the license file in use.
An invalid token has been requested by the license server. Check license file is valid and up to date.
The specified option is not properly used. Check tool's usage.
The specified option is unknown. Check tool's usage.
Command line synthax invalid. Check tool's usage.
The specified file cannot be open. Check user's rights, and file path.
Display the usage of binary avtreserve. avtreserve is used by the avt license server (avtld).
Token reservation failed. Check token name and reservation command synthax.
Display usage for monitoring tokens information.
The binary ends with an error. Other messages should bring more information.
The license server was unable to get a pid for the token process.
The license server is unreachable. Check a valid license server is running.
A variable needs to be set in the environment. Avertec documentation supplies the user with the variables legal values.
Another license server has been found and will be tryed. This can occur if the original license server specified by the user was not found or returned an error.
The license server is not valid or was not responding. Check a valid license server is running.
The running tool encountered an error. Specific information supplied by the tool is displayed.
No token information available for the license server. If a binary (avtinfo, avtdeltoken, or other avt license server utility) has been used, please check the relevant usage.
The command line synthax used is not valid. Check for relevant avt license server utility usage.

err.msg: Bad file name, check autorisation for %s
err.doc: The utility failed to open the specified license key or log file.
The avt license server returns an error with the license log file. Usually not a critical error for the running process if avtld is used rather than flexnet.

err.msg: AVT-_LICENSE_FILE not set and $AVT_TOOLS_DIR/etc/avtlicense.lic missing.\nIf errors occur, please check your Flexlm license paths.
err.doc: The flex license file was not found. Use the flexnet license utilities to get information about flexnet license status.
A generic message displaying error numbers returned by flexnet. Flexnet (or FlexLM) documentation provide some clue to handle surch error number.

err.msg: Unable to find Flexlm job corresponding to feature %s\n
err.doc: The specified feature is not valid or no job use it. Flexnet license utilities can provide information about the feature, and the jobs running.

err.msg: Please, resolve Flexlm errors before running Avertec programs.\n
err.doc: Flexnet encounters an error. As long as Flexnet license will not runs properly no licensed Avertec tool can be run. Dealling with license errors is a priority. Check if license file path and license daemon are valid and reachable.

err.msg: Log level of variable '%s' is not a number. It is '%s'.\n
err.doc: Please refer to the configuration of log report.

err.msg: Log level of variable '%s' must be a positive number less or equal to 9. It is '%s'.\n
err.doc: Please refer to the configuration of log report.
Please refer to the configuration of log report.

err.msg: Invalid value '%s' for configuration variable '%s', should be 'yes' or 'no'\n
err.doc: Please refer to the HiTas Reference Guide.

err.msg: Invalid value '%s' for configuration variable '%s', please refer to the Reference Guide for correct values\n
err.doc: Please refer to the HiTas Reference Guide.

err.msg: Invalid file format '%s' for '%s', please refer to the Reference Guide for valid formats\n
err.doc: Valid formats are 'spice', 'lib', 'tlf3', 'tlf4', 'ttv', 'vhdl', 'verilog', 'dspf', 'spef' and 'inf'.

err.msg: Could not find a file matching '%s'\n
err.doc: The specified filename filter does not match any files in accessible directories.

err.msg: Multiple settings for configuration variable '%s': '%s' is overwritten by '%s'\n
Subsequent call to 'avt_LoadFile' will not retain previous definitions of global parameters\n
err.doc: The scope of .SCALE, .GLOBAL or other global parameters is limited to the files loaded by a single call of 'avt_LoadFile'. The values of those global parameters are not retained for subsequent calls of 'avt_LoadFile'.

err.msg: received answer from job %d, but is not running !\n
job %d is not in state STAT_EXEC_WAIT when received begin packet\n
job %d is not in state STAT_EXEC_RUN when received data\n
job %d is not in state STAT_EXEC_RUN when received end\n
A system error occured when runing a new job\n
Statistical result file '%s' already exist. Using '%s'.\n
Error in %s table. Entry %d correspond to index %d.\n

err.doc: Valid value are '1mW', '100uW', '10uW', '1uW', '100nW', '10nW', '1nW', '100pW', '10pW' and '1pW'.
